articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Remodeled Sporting Bullet Factory, Meari Shooting Gallery
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Remodeled Sporting Bullet Factory, Meari Shooting Gallery
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round the remodeled sporting bullet factory and Meari Shooting Gallery.
					 The first leg of his visit was the sporting bullet factory.
					
					 Looking round various places of the factory including its production processes and research institute, he learned in detail about the technical conditions of equipment, production and scientific researches there.
					
					 He noted the successful remodeling of the factory in a modern way requiring high science and technology in a short span of time is another proof of the validity and great vitality of the WPK's line on building self-supporting national economy.
					
					 Pleased that the interior and exterior of the factory have been built up very successfully to be impeccable as required by the design approved by the party, he expressed satisfaction at the factory which has become an icon factory to be proud of.
					
					 He highly praised the builders for successfully remodeling the factory in a short span of time.
					
					 He acquainted himself with the quality of bullets at a newly built underground shooting gallery of the factory.
					
					 He said in order to improve the quality of sporting bullets it is necessary to direct primary efforts to scientific researches, robotize the production processes and steadily raise the technical skills of employees.
					
					 He underlined the need for the officials and employees of the factory to successfully manage the newly remodeled factory and keep the production going at a high rate with the pride and honor of working at the factory, a foundation for developing the defence sports.
					
					 The next leg of his visit was the Meari Shooting Gallery.
					
					 Going round various places of the gallery which have been dramatically face-lifted, he learned about their management, operation and arrangements for service.
					
					 He said with a broad smile on his face that he felt as if he were at a hotel as the designing and construction of the gallery were ensured on a high level and its logo has also been designed in a peculiar manner.
					
					 He was pleased with service facilities including several modern shooting ranges, archery grounds, video-game facilities and restaurant successfully built as intended by the party.
					
					 Instructing officials to start service in March after making full arrangements for operating it, he noted when the gallery is open, the visitors would be pleased very much.
					
					 Saying that it is an important work for thoroughly implementing the behests of leader Kim Jong Il for promoting the cultural and emotional life of the people to successfully manage and operate the gallery, he gave precious instructions for operating the gallery on a regular basis.
					
					 He was accompanied by General of the Internal Security Forces Choe Pu Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and minister of People's Security, and Ma Won Chun, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Nepali Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Nepali Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Monday received a message of greeting from Jalanath Kanal, chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist).
					 Jalanath Kanal in the message expressed sincere reverence for leader Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, on the occasion of his 72nd birth anniversary on behalf of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist) and on his own behalf. He recalled that Kim Jong Il made an immortal contribution to the struggle of the Korean people against imperialism.
					
					 He noted that the Korean people have achieved brilliant successes in the revolutionary struggle for defending the country and socialism under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Reaffirming absolute support to the DPRK in its struggle for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country, the Nepali party expresses belief that the peaceful reunification of Korea would be surely achieved to help ensure peace and stability of the region and, furthermore, peace of the world, the message said.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the Korean people prosperity, expressing belief that the friendly relations existing between the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist) and the WPK, will be everlasting.

articles.title: Inter-Korean High-level Contact to Be Held
articles.content:
Inter-Korean High-level Contact to Be Held
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A north-south high-level contact will be held at Panmunjom on Wednesday. 
					 Members of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK with Won Tong Yon, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, as head from the north side will take part in the contact to discuss issues related to the north-south relations.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Condolences to Widow of Vishwanath
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Condolences to Widow of Vishwanath
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message to Santoshi Kumari, widow of Vishwanath, expressing condolences on his death of illness. Vishwanath was the secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					 Kim Yong Nam said in his message Vishwanath was a prominent socio-political figure who tirelessly worked hard for the independent development of his country and freedom and happiness of its people from his early years and a close friend of the Korean people and other progressives of the world as he devoted himself to the sacred cause of achieving human independence under the banner of the immortal Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung and enriched in depth by leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Though Vishwanath passed away, his precious exploits will be always remembered by the Korean people and other progressives, the message added.

articles.title: Iranian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Iranian embassy here Wednesday hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club to mark the 35th anniversary of the victory of the Islamic revolution of Iran.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor who is chairman of the Korea-Iran Friendship Association, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Kil Song, vice foreign minister, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 Present there were Ambassador Mansour Chavoshi and staff members of the Iranian embassy here.

articles.title: Chinese Guests, Overseas Koreans Here
articles.content:
Chinese Guests, Overseas Koreans Here
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Chinese guests and overseas Koreans arrived here on Wednesday to take part in the 18th Kimjongilia Festival.
					 They were Yang Hongzhun, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Hunchun, China, Liu Chensheng, board director of the Shenyang Korean Trade and Investment Consulting Co. Ltd., Choe Ryong Ho, vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, and Ri Yong Ho, managing director of the Dandong Shengmin Trading Co. Ltd., China, and their parties.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans led by Kim Svetlana, branch head of the United Confederation of Koreans in Uzbekistan, Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 Members of the delegation laid a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them in humblest reverence for the peerlessly great men who performed undying feats for strengthening the Juche-oriented overseas compatriots' movement.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Project for Remodeling May Day Stadium
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Project for Remodeling May Day Stadium
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, made a field survey of the project for remodeling May Day Stadium here.
					 The stadium, associated with the immortal leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, is being remodeled as required by the new century under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Going round various places of the construction site, Choe encouraged the builders to push ahead with the project, true to the field instructions given by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called upon the People's Army to deeply cherish the mission as the army of the leader and the party and qualitatively complete the construction in a short span of time by unconditionally carrying out the order of Kim Jong Un in the van without an inch of deflection and sufficiently supplying materials and fuel needed for the construction.
					
					 He stressed the need for all the builders to round off the project on the highest level by fully displaying Kim Jong Il's patriotism, bearing in mind Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on the people.

articles.title: Active Leading Personnel of Worker-Peasant Red Guards Meet
articles.content:
Active Leading Personnel of Worker-Peasant Red Guards Meet
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting of active leading personnel of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards took place here Tuesday.
					 President Kim Il Sung gave origin to the building of the revolutionary militia forces in the flames of the anti-Japanese struggle and organized militia organizations of various types after the liberation of the country.
					
					 He reorganized the People's Self-defence Forces into the Worker-Peasant Red Guards on Jan. 14, Juche 48 (1959).
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the Workers' Party of Korea's military idea and line on self-defence and led the militia to a shining victory since he started the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Under the energetic guidance of Kim Jong Il, a peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards have developed into a reliable wing of the People's Army strong enough to annihilate enemies.
					
					 Attending the meeting were Choe Pu Il, minister of People's Security, O Il Jong, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, officials of the party and power organs in Pyongyang and local areas, those in civilian defence forces field and leading personnel of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the successes and experience gained in the efforts for thoroughly implementing the WPK's policy of putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress in line with the Songun idea of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and under their leadership. It also discussed tasks for effecting a fresh revolutionary turn in increasing the combat capacity of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and ways for doing so.
					
					 O Il Jong made a report which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the foundation of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards led to the establishment of the all-people and whole-of-nation defence system centering on the People's Army, and provided a sure guarantee for honorably defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation from the U.S. imperialists' ceaseless aggression moves and for pushing forward the socialist construction.
					
					 The Worker-Peasant Red Guards have greeted the heyday of their development under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, they noted.
					
					 They vowed to establish strict monolithic leadership system of Kim Jong Un within the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and creditably fulfill their honorable mission as the revolutionary armed forces of the party and the supreme commander.
					
					 They pledged to thoroughly carry out the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the party's policy of putting all the people under arms and turning the whole country into a fortress, resolutely foiling the enemies' aggression moves and defending their hometowns, villages, factories and working sites.
					
					 They said they would defend the country and push forward the building of an economic power by holding a rifle in one hand and a hammer or a sickle or a writing brush in the other hand and thus fully display the might of the great army-people unity.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The participants in the meeting of active leading personnel of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards on Wednesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 At the halls where the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il stand they paid tribute to the statues, looking back on the exploits the peerlessly Songun brilliant commanders performed by developing the Worker-Peasant Red Guards into invincible revolutionary armed forces with their outstanding ideas and energetic leadership.
					
					 At the immortality halls they paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls that house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Schoolchildren
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Schoolchildren
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art group members of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace Wednesday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as solo and pangchang "Full Moon on Jong Il Peak", poem and story-telling "General and Our Palace" and Janggu presentation "Our General Is the Best".
					
					 The performers impressively depicted the ardent yearning and boundless reverence of schoolchildren for leader Kim Jong Il, who laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country by considering the work for training successors to the revolution as the nation's most important affair and always making devoted efforts for it.
					
					 They sang of the immensely rosy future of Songun Korea led by Marshal Kim Jong Un in such numbers as male chorus "Our Marshal Is the Best", female chorus "Our Joy, Pride and Hope" and duet and Kayagum ensemble "Where Will We Go First".
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers dealing the ardent love and intense loyalty of the schoolchildren to the country.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials concerned and school youth and children.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Secret Camp in Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Many People Visit Kim Jong Il's Birthplace in Mt. Paektu
Samjiyon, February 12 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel and people are visiting the secret camp in Mt. Paektu, the holy place of the revolution, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The secret camp in Mt. Paektu is the secret base where President Kim Il Sung built a central leadership base of the Korean revolution and used it as the centre for activities of the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, holy place of the revolution where leader Kim Jong Il was born and a place associated with the immortal exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 There are various revolutionary historic sites including the log cabin of the headquarters where the President stayed, the  log cabin where Kim Jong Il was born, shallow well used by Kim Jong Suk, revolutionary slogans which she personally wrote on barked trees and lodging quarters for guerrillas.
					
					 In February the number of visitors to the birthplace of Kim Jong Il in the Paektusan Secret Camp is on the daily increase. They include service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and members of study tour groups of the Ministry of Railways, the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and school youth and children from across the country.
					
					 After reaching the Sobaeksu Valley, service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children placed floral baskets and flowers before the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them.
					
					 In front of the monument inscribed with the poem "Shining Star" personally written by the President they were deeply impressed to listen to the explanation about how he personally wrote it in praise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They visited Kim Jong Il's birthplace with Jong Il Peak towering high behind it. They held oath-taking meetings at which they renewed their resolution to remain true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and steadfastly carry forward the bloodline of Juche and revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They toured various places to deeply learn about the revolutionary careers of the brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu and their undying feats.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Is Always Alive in Hearts of DPRK People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Is Always Alive in Hearts of DPRK People
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people of the DPRK are becoming more ardent in their yearning for leader Kim Jong Il, who cared so much for their life in his lifetime, with the approach of his birth anniversary, the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16).
					 Whenever he inspected military units, he called at kitchens to acquaint himself with servicepersons' diet and took necessary measures to improve it. 
					
					 Innumerable are the stories about the loving care shown by him for servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 There is a story based on his boundless loving care for people. It was when a hydro-power station of national significance was under construction.
					
					 When learning about the details of the construction and living conditions of evacuees from the area to be submerged, he took immediate measures to build dwelling houses for them and set it as a regulation to build houses for evacuees before starting any construction projects.
					
					 This story gives a glimpse of the ties of kinship between Kim Jong Il and the people in the DPRK.
					
					 As the Day of the Shining Star comes nearer, the servicepersons and citizens of the DPRK are recalling with deep emotion the undying exploits he performed on behalf of the country and the people, revering him as their father.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Its Mexican Rival 2:0
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Soccer Team Beats Its Mexican Rival 2:0
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The 2014 Women's Soccer Four-Nation Invitation Tournament started at Yongchuan, Chongqing of China.
					 The tournament will continue till Saturday with the participation of the DPRK, China, New Zealand and Mexico.  
					
					 The DPRK team beat its Mexican rival in the first match on Tuesday. 
					
					 The DPRK team dominated the match from the beginning by staging fierce attack, scoring two goals in the second half.
					
					 It will play the next match with the New Zealand team on Thursday.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Mark Day of Shining Star
Chongjin, February 12 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of foreign crewmen at Chongjin Port Wednesday to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 They laid bouquets before the mosaics depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Cambodian-flagged ship MATILDA.
					
					 The speakers at the meeting said Kim Jong Il performed unprecedentedly great exploits in all fields including politics, military, economy and culture for a long period of leading the revolution and construction.
					
					 He is still greatly lauded and deeply respected by all peoples for developing the friendly and cooperative relations with various countries through his energetic external activities and making undying contributions to protecting peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world, they said.
					
					 They expressed conviction that a rosy future would always be in store for the Korean people and proud successes would be made in their efforts for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Best Judoists of DPRK for 2013
articles.content:
Best Judoists of DPRK for 2013
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Sol Kyong and Hong Kuk Hyon were selected as best woman and man judoists of the DPRK for Juche 102 (2013).
					 Sol took the women's 78kg category title in the 2013 World Judo Championship, becoming the country's first world heavyweight judo champion. She won a silver medal in the 2013 Asian Judo Championship.
					
					 Hong bagged a gold medal in the 2013 Asian Judo Championship and a bronze medal in the 6th East Asian Games.

articles.title: New Kind of Antiseptic Solution Producer Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Antiseptic Solution Producer Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A new kind of small-sized antiseptic solution producer was developed by the Environmental Engineering Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK.
					 It is a device that produces sodium carbonate hypochlorite solution applicable to many fields including decontamination of wastewater, facilities and seeds.
					
					 The solution, useful for scores of days after production, gives no gas pollution in working places.
					
					 The device automatically intercepts overcurrent to secure the production of the solution.
					
					 It has already been applied to the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, Kangso Knitwear Factory and other factories.

articles.title: Cooking Show Given at National Cooking Competition
articles.content:
Cooking Show Given at National Cooking Competition
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A demonstration cooking was given at the recent national cooking competition held here.
					 What drew attention of the spectators in the demonstration was cooking of mung-bean pancake, one of traditional dishes, and seasoned rice rolled in laver.
					
					 O Yong Ran, a cook of the Chongnyu Restaurant, distinguished herself in cooking mung-bean pancake. She made a tasty and soft mung-bean pancake with lard, displaying her refined and swift skills.
					
					 In preparing seasoned rice rolled in laver, cooks of the Taedonggang District Restaurants demonstrated their special skills. They used processed beef, sand eel and vegetables in making this dish.
					
					 The demonstration showed the cooks' devoted efforts for improving the people's diet.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Fiercely Raising Flames of Ideological Revolution
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Fiercely Raising Flames of Ideological Revolution
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday carries an editorial on the lapse of 40 years since leader Kim Jong Il kindled the torch of editorial revolution in the organ of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The editorial says:
					
					 Editorial revolution was a grandiose prelude to media revolution and a gunfire which greatly encouraged all the people to the drive for the great socialist construction.
					
					 Media of the DPRK are loyal mouthpieces, staunch defenders, powerful propagandists and close educators upholding the idea and cause of the party with writing brush and mike.
					
					 The present ideological campaign, information service and agitation are the general offensive of media which the media sector including papers, news agency and radios should steer as the standard-bearer.
					
					 Only when media seethe with revolutionary ardor, can the ideological front be bubbled with enthusiasm and the whole country advance with the revolutionary zeal and high spirit.
					
					 Whether the remarkably surging enthusiasm of the army and people of the DPRK leads to heroic exploits and the grand idea and determination of the party are translated into a brilliant reality or not mainly depends on the role of media persons defending the outpost of the ideological front of the party. 
					
					 Nothing can substitute for the forerunners' role of media in imbuing the whole party and society with the monolithic idea, revolutionary idea of the leader only, making the leader and the people link with the one blood vessel and instilling indomitable spirit of the uninterrupted revolution into all service personnel and people.
					
					 When media make the whole country replete with the death-defying spirit of doing anything when the party is determined, strong belief that we will go ahead of the world with our efforts and technology as early as possible and indomitable spirit pulling through the manifold ordeals and difficulties, the country can make a leap forward higher and faster.

articles.title: Ideological Work Guarantees Victory in Socialist Cause: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ideological Work Guarantees Victory in Socialist Cause: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Socialism will certainly triumph by virtue of united struggle of the people armed with socialist ideology, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 Only when the popular masses are armed with the socialist ideology and the socialist ideological position is hardened, can they consolidate, develop and defend socialism in any trials, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 To be a strong country there should be a powerful military muscle and developed economy. However what is more essential is ideology.
					
					 The power of rifle depends on the ideological preparedness of the owner. It is the might of ideology that turns impossible into possible and makes ideals come true. One who adheres to ideological work will get strong and win.
					
					 This is proven by the practical experience of the Korean revolution.
					
					 It is the traditional political mode of the Workers' Party of Korea to push forward the revolution and construction with the might of ideology.
					
					 The WPK has conducted ideological work to give the fullest play to the revolutionary enthusiasm of the service personnel and people and worked epochal miracles in the socialist construction in the grim days of the revolution.
					
					 When socialism collapsed in some countries due to the imperialists' anti-socialist moves, socialism in the DPRK stood firmly and emerged victorious. One of major secrets to this was that the WPK gave the top priority to the ideological work.
					
					 It is the intention of the WPK to improve the ideological awareness and moral traits of the party members and other working people by intensifying ideological campaign, information service and agitation and give a great momentum to the general advance for a final victory in building a thriving country.

articles.title: It is Steadfast Will of DPRK to Protect Peace: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
It is Steadfast Will of DPRK to Protect Peace: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- It is the firm stand and will of the DPRK to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula in order to achieve a lasting peace, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Wednesday.
					 It went on:
					
					 To remove a danger of war and keep peace on the peninsula is essential both for the destiny of the Korean nation and for the prospect of the north-south relations.
					
					 Peace is priceless to every nation, and it is dearer to the Koran nation that has lived in danger of war for more than half a century.
					
					 The war disaster that the nation experienced during the 1950-53 Korean War is what all Koreans can not still forget.
					
					 If another war breaks out on the peninsula, it will lead to a nuclear war, and it is the Korean nation that is to suffer the worst disaster.
					
					 Peace is a prerequisite to mending the inter-Korean ties.
					
					 It is crystal clear to all that distrust can never be removed and dialogue and cooperation can not take place in such a situation where one side resorts to military saber-rattling to threaten the other side.
					
					 Unless a peaceful atmosphere is created in the peninsula, it is not possible to expect the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south of Korea nor is it possible to expect them to advance towards the reunification hand in hand.
					
					 Peace can never be achieved by efforts of one side only.
					
					 Only when the south Korean authorities positively respond to the sincere efforts of the fellow countrymen in the north, can the efforts of the DPRK for peace come to fruition.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A general meeting of the Christian Presbyterian Church of south Korea in its commentary on Monday called for the implementation of north-south joint declarations, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The commentary said the agreement on the reunion of separated families and relatives is of great significance in mending the north-south relations.
					
					 It called for settling the issues of resuming tour of Mt. Kumgang and canceling "May 24 Step" with the agreement as a momentum and thus bring about diverse exchanges, cooperation and dialogue between the north and the south.
					
					 The commentary hoped that the agreement would serve as a starting point for implementing the important June 15 north-south joint declaration and October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Bird Flu Breaks Out in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Breaks Out in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Bird flu broke out in farmhouses of Hwasong, Kyonggi Province and Ryongam, South Jolla Province of south Korea, according to south Korean MBC on Feb. 8.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Britain
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Britain
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with Korean people took place in London on Feb. 2 to support the New Year Address of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and the crucial proposal of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Present there were personages of the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and masses.
					
					 Attended there on invitation were members of the DPRK Mission in Britain.
					
					 At the meeting Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, informed the participants of the part related to Korea's reunification in the New Year Address and the crucial proposal made by the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made there to fully support the crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK calling for paving a broad avenue for mending the north-south relations and to express solidarity with the cause of the Korean people.
					
					 A decision was made there to send to the British parliament a letter urging it to adopt a resolution demanding the U.S. and the south Korean authorities cancel their projected Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, and to stage a protest demonstration outside the U.S. and south Korean embassies in London in case the military drills start.

articles.title: Projected U.S.-S. Korean War Drills under Fire in Russia
articles.content:
Projected U.S.-S. Korean War Drills under Fire in Russia
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- There took place protest actions outside the U.S. and south Korean embassies in Moscow on Jan. 31 and Feb. 1 to support the crucial proposal of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and protest against the projected joint military drills of the U.S. and south Korea.
					 Attending the actions were personages of six Russian political parties and organizations including the Communists Party of Russia and the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks and masses.
					
					 Published there was a joint appeal addressed to the U.S. and the south Korean authorities, which supported the crucial proposal made by the NDC of the DPRK and denounced the projected Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills for aggression.
					
					 Saying the international community including Russia is expressing deep concern over the situation on the Korean peninsula as it is inching close to a crisis, the appeal noted:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities are going to kick off Key Resolve and Foal Eagle in late February under the plea of "defensive" drills.
					
					 Reptile media of the U.S. and south Korea are vying with each other to distort the essence of the issue and float such a false rumor that the DPRK has driven the north-south relations into confrontation.
					
					 However, such farce went into total bankruptcy after the NDC of the DPRK made public a crucial proposal calling for paving a broad avenue for mending the north-south relations on Jan. 16.
					
					 If the detailed and explicit crucial proposal is implemented, a new chapter of peace will be unfolded in the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 This will also help settle all the matters arising in the north-south relations including the reunion of separated families and relatives.
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities positively respond to the crucial proposal.

articles.title: Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Denounced by British Organizations
articles.content:
Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Denounced by British Organizations
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a joint statement on Jan. 24 denouncing the projected U.S.-south Korea war drills.
					 The statement termed the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills explicit war moves against the DPRK.
					
					 Such moves to stifle socialist Korea are bound to meet shameful ruin before the Korean people who are closely united around supreme leader Kim Jong Un and the Workers' Party of Korea, it stressed.
					
					 It called on all the followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea and friends of the Korean people to strongly denounce the U.S. imperialists for their moves of aggression and defend the DPRK in every way.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. imperialists immediately pull its forces out of south Korea.

articles.title: Japan's Past Crimes against Humanity Denounced by Personage of Regional Body
articles.content:
Japan's Past Crimes against Humanity Denounced by Personage of Regional Body
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, made public on Jan. 23 an article disclosing the inhuman crimes committed by Japanese imperialism against the Korean people.
					 Noting the Japanese imperialists perpetrated heinous crimes against Korean people in the past, the article said:
					
					 They occupied the Korean peninsula at the point of bayonet and plundered it of huge human and material resources.
					
					 They brutally massacred more than one million Koreans, forcibly took away and abducted over 8.4 million young and middle-aged Koreans to force them into slave labor and drive them to shambles of war of aggression. They also forced 200 000 Korean women into wretched sexual slavery.
					
					 Such crimes against humanity can never be covered up, disregarded, forgotten and written off in history.
					
					 However, Prime Minister Abe and other politicians of Japan are openly negating the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 Their crimes aimed to obliterate the Korean nation can never be concealed.
					
					 Japan's moves to revive militarism prove that it schemes to inflict disasters again upon the Korean people and other peoples in Asia and set up a springboard for establishing new military fascist dictatorship.
					
					 Such acts of Japan are being perpetrated under the patronage of the U.S. seeking world domination.

articles.title: Day of Sun and Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Brazil
articles.content:
Day of Sun and Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Brazil
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A Brazilian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) and the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on February 6.
					 The chairperson of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events including meeting and seminar till the end of April.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) from January 30 to February 3.
					 They included round-table talks in Russia, a meeting and film show in Benin and a lecture and film show in Nigeria.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Pyongyang Today" and "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored a lot of profound works in his lifetime through his tireless ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a power that any formidable enemy dares not provoke by directing primary efforts to bolstering the military forces under the unfurled banner of the Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 We are sure that the DPRK will certainly win victory in the fierce confrontation with imperialists as supreme leader Kim Jong Un wisely leads the party, army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who is chairman of the Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 72nd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il said that Kim Jong Il always led socialist Korea to victory, overcoming all trials of history by dint of ideology.
					
					 The manager of a Nigerian agro-stock farm said that a statue of Kim Jong Il was erected at Kim Il Sung University, adding that Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Benin.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Dominica
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Dominica
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A Dominican preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed at the building of the United Left Movement of Dominica on February 6.
					 Jose Miguel Mejia, secretary general of the movement who is minister of Government of Dominica, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 He said at the inaugural ceremony that it is the proud tradition of the movement to form the preparatory committee to celebrate the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il every year, and went on;
					
					 It is also an expression of reverence and obligation to the great leader who devoted himself to the prosperity and independent reunification of Korea and the development of the world progressive forces.

articles.title: Bulletin "Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" Issued by Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
Bulletin "Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" Issued by Bangladeshi Organization
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy issued a bulletin titled "Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" on February 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's love for the country was the most sincere and ardent one.
					
					 His deep patriotism could be seen through his efforts dedicated to defending the DPRK and turning it into a thriving nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il held higher the banner of Songun in the closing period of the 20th century when the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK politically and militarily and strangle its economy reached the extremes.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a world military power and an invincible socialist fortress no enemy dares provoke.
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted his everything to the country's prosperity and people's happiness.
					
					 His patriotism, precious mental legacy bequeathed by him to the Korean people, serves as a beacon and compass for the way of genuine patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Organizations of Brazil, Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Organizations of Brazil, Peru
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Peru posted articles on their websites on January 29 and February 4 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article titled "Immortal feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il in accomplishing cause of global independence" said:
					
					 The history does not know such a great man as Kim Jong Il who performed great exploits in accomplishing the cause of global independence with his profound idea and leadership ability. 
					
					 He brightly indicated the way of accomplishing the cause of global independence with his tireless ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He also successfully led the human cause of independence with his outstanding leadership ability.
					
					 The most important feat he performed in triumphantly advancing the cause of global independence is that he smashed the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended Korean-style socialism and peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world by pursuing his original Songun politics.
					
					 He paid deep attention to developing relations with foreign countries aspiring after independence and conducted energetic external activities to build a new world to which the idea of independence, peace and friendship is applied.
					
					 The exploits he performed in accomplishing the cause of global independence will shine long along with history.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship in articles titled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism" and "The Juche idea and Kim Jong Il" praised his sacred revolutionary career and ideological and theoretical exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Introduced by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Introduced by Swiss Organization
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il posted an article on his feats illustrated with his photo on the websites of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on February 1.
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward and developed the main idea of the foreign policy -- independence, peace and friendship, set forth by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He consolidated the DPRK into the fortress of the struggle to defend the global socialist movement and independence by pursuing his Songun politics.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist moves to stifle the DPRK proved futile as it was led by him.
					
					 The U.S. was compelled to recognize the DPRK, in fact.
					
					 This was a historic victory of Songun.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the DPRK could register great success in the field of external relations and demonstrate the might of a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 It turned into a political, ideological and military power that any formidable enemy dares not provoke and is now dynamically advancing toward an economic power thanks to his Songun politics.
					
					 The international position and prestige of the DPRK were remarkably enhanced. This is greatly inspiring the Korean people out in the struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, is successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il without an inch of deflection.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Nomination as Candidate for Deputy to SPA Hailed by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Nomination as Candidate for Deputy to SPA Hailed by British Organizations
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Feb. 5 congratulating supreme leader Kim Jong Un upon his nomination as a candidate for deputy to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Un's nomination as a candidate for deputy to the 13th SPA is an expression of full support and respect of the DPRK service personnel and people for him.
					
					 He wisely leads the drive of the Korean people to build socialism by carrying forward the Songun revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, it noted.
					
					 The Korean people are single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un, it said. A final victory is in store for the Korean people led by him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted on Russian Website
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A detailed gist of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was posted on "Irkutskblogspot," website of Irkutsk, Russia on February 3.
					 The website carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Britain
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Britain
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- There took place a joint seminar and book exhibition in London on Feb. 1 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 40th anniversary of his proclamation of the programme for modeling whole society on Kimilsungism. Those events were co-sponsored by the New Communist Party of Britain, British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association.
					 On display in the exhibition were works of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and publications introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, said in his speech:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address said that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took the resolute measure of removing the factionalists from the party last year, further consolidating the party and the revolutionary ranks and solidifying their single-minded unity to the maximum. 
					
					 Unshakable is the revolutionary will of all the members of the WPK to uphold Kim Jong Un as the unitary center of the unity and leadership.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of the Songun Policy, said Kim Jong Il provided the guidelines to be adhered to by the WPK and the service personnel and people of the DPRK ranging from the principle of the Juche idea to the line on the Songun revolution and the theory on building a thriving nation and from the theories on party, army and power building to the idea and theory on global independence. His ideological and theoretical exploits go beyond the imagination of humankind, the chairman added.
					
					 A professor of University of London noted that Kim Jong Il systematized the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung in an integral way and clarified the correct guiding idea, revolutionary theory and fighting method in the era of independence.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's is a noble, revolutionary career of a gifted thinker and theoretician and peerless statesman who glorified the DPRK as a dignified political and ideological power, the professor added.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Cartucho Deportivo y Centro de Tiro Meari
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Cartucho Deportivo y Centro de Tiro Meari
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la Fabrica de Cartucho Deportivo y el Centro de Tiro Meari, nuevamente remodelados.
					En el primer destino, el Mariscal paso revista a las cadenas de produccion, el instituto y otros lugares conociendo en detalles del estado tecnico de las instalaciones, la situacion productiva y el estado de investigacion cientifica.
					
					Subrayo que fue reconstruida en un corto plazo la moderna fabrica de cartucho que exige la elevada ciencia y tecnologia, lo que comprueba otra vez la justeza de la linea del partido de construir la economia nacional independiente y su gran vitalidad.
					
					Diciendo que el interior y el exterior de la fabrica fueron acondicionados segun el diseno firmado por el partido, se mostro satisfecho de que esta es una fabrica perfecta digna de enorgullecer.
					
					Y evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores que la remodelaron en un corto plazo.
					
					En la sala subterranea de tiro de ensayo, el Mariscal averiguo la calidad de cartucho.
					
					A fin de mejorar la calidad de productos, hay que dar primordial fuerza a la investigacion cientifica, senalo y agrego la necesidad de automatizar absolutamente las cadenas productivas y elevar de continuo el nivel de calificacion tecnica de los empleados.
					
					Enfatizo que los funcionarios y los empleados con el orgullo y la dignidad de ser miembros de la fabrica que contribuyen al desarrollo de los deportes militares, deben cuidarla bien y normalizar la produccion en el alto nivel.
					
					En el Centro de Tiro Meari el Mariscal al recorrer varios puntos totalmente renovados, hizo conocimiento del estado de la administracion y los preparativos de servicio.
					
					Senalo sonriendo que el diseno y la obra del centro fueron garantizados en alto nivel, razon por la cual le parecia estar en un hotel y es especifica la insignia del centro.
					
					Refirio que conforme a la voluntad del partido, estuvieron acondicionadas las modernas salas de tiro, de tiro al arco, instalaciones de juegos  electronicos, comedor y otras instalaciones.
					
					Hay que completar estrictamente los preparativos de gestion del centro para que abran las puertas desde el marzo, dijo y anadio que si abre el centro, el pueblo se quedara muy contento.
					
					Gestionarlo bien constituye una labor importante para materializar el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il de mejorar la vida cultural del pueblo coreano, senalo y dio preciosas instrucciones que se presentan para normalizar la gestion del centro.
					
					Le acompanaron el general de ejercito del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior Choe Pu Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, y Ma Won Chun, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de politico nepales
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de politico nepales 
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 10 Jhalanath Khanal, presidente del Comite Central del Partido Comunista Unido de Nepal (Marxista-Leninista).
					El texto va como sigue: 
					
					Querido companero,
					
					En ocasion del 72o aniversario del natalicio del eterno Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, companero Kim Jong Il, le expreso de todo corazon el sentimiento de respeto en nombre del Comite Central del Partido Comunista Unido de Nepal (Marxista-Leninista) y en el mio propio recordando que el hizo inmortal aporte a la lucha del pueblo coreano contra el imperialismo. 
					
					Bajo la energica guia de Su Excelencia, hoy en dia, el pueblo coreano defiende el socialismo y alcanza relevantes exitos en la lucha revolucionaria por la defensa del socialismo. 
					
					Reafirmando nuestro apoyo total a la lucha de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por defender la dignidad y la soberania del pais, nuestro partido manifiesta la seguridad de que se lograra sin falta la reunificacion pacifica de Corea que posibilitara preservar la paz y la estabilidad de la region y la paz del mundo. 
					
					Convencido de que seran eternas las relaciones de amistad existentes entre el Partido Comunista Unido de Nepal  (Marxista-Leninista) y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, aprovecho esta oportunidad para desear buena salud a Su Excelencia y prosperidad al pueblo coreano. 
					
					Reciba mi saludo fraternal.

articles.title: Tendra lugar el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Tendra lugar el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar este miercoles en Phanmunjom el contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea. 
					En la ocasion participaran por la parte Norte los miembros del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezados por el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Won Tong Yon. 
					
					La cita discutira los problemas sobre las relaciones intercoreanas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias por el deceso de Vishwanath
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias por el deceso de Vishwanath
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que fallecio lamentablemente a causa de una enfermedad Vishwanath, secretario general del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Il Sung y del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il y director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de condolencias a la viuda Santoshi Kumari. 
					El texto recuerda que el Dr. Vishwanath fue celebre activista sociopolitico que desde hace mucho tiempo, trabajo con abnegacion por el desarrollo independiente de su patria y por la libertad y felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Prosigue que fue tambien intimo amigo del pueblo coreano y los demas progresistas del mundo que dedico toda la vida a la sagrada causa para verificar la independencia de la humanidad bajo la bandera de la inmortal idea Juche, concebida por el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y desarrollada y enriquecida por el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Aunque el fallecio, sus nobles proezas quedaran para siempre en el alma del pueblo coreano y la humanidad progresista, apunta.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae averigua remodelacion del Estadio Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae averigua remodelacion del Estadio Primero de Mayo
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, visito el Estadio Primero de Mayo para averiguar en el terreno como marcha la obra de remodelacion.
					Bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se reconstruye a la altura del nuevo siglo ese estadio donde estan registradas las huellas de direccion de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					En su recorrido por varios puntos del campo de reconstruccion, Choe reconocio los exitos de trabajo de los constructores que aceleran la obra para cumplir las instrucciones del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un dadas en el terreno.
					
					Senalo que el EPC debe materializar incondicionalmente en la delantera la orden del Comandante Supremo teniendo presente la mision del ejercito del lider y el partido.
					
					Asi tiene que terminar con calidad la obra en un corto plazo, dijo y resalto la necesidad de suministrar los materiales y combustibles necesarios.
					
					Destaco que todos los constructores han de trabajar con el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il guardando profundamente en el corazon la noble concepcion del Comandante Supremo sobre el pueblo y terminar asi en el maximo nivel la remodelacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a avivar mas llamarada de revolucion ideologica
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a avivar mas llamarada de revolucion ideologica
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- El periodico Rodong Sinmun inserto este miercoles el editorial dedicado al 40o aniversario del encendimiento de la antorcha de la revolucion de editorial por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el organo del partido.
					El editorial senala que la revolucion de editorial fue el preludio solemne de la revolucion de prensa e informacion y un canonazo fuerte que estimula a todo el pueblo a la gran campana por la construccion del socialismo, y continua:
					
					La prensa e informacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sirven de portavoz fiel, firme defensor, fuerte agitador e intimo educador que apoyan la idea y causa del Partido con pluma y microfono.
					
					La batalla ideologica, propagandistica y agitadora de hoy deviene una ofensiva general de medios de prensa que debe hacer la rama de prensa e informacion inclusive el periodico, agencia noticiera y radioemisora.
					
					Si los medios de prensa trabajan con afan, lo imitara el frente ideologico y todo el pais se animara por el entusiasmo revolucionario y coraje combativo.
					
					Los periodistas y otros hombres de prensa, vanguardias del frente ideologico del partido, desempenan un gran papel para que todos los militares y civiles coreanos realicen meritos heroicos y que se materialicen el magno proyecto y decision del partido.
					
					No se puede sustituir por nada el papel vanguardista de las publicaciones en armar toda la sociedad con la unica idea, la revolucionaria del lider, conectar el linaje sanguineo entre el lider y el pueblo y sembrar en el corazon de los uniformados y civiles el indoblegable espiritu de la revolucion sucesiva.
					
					Cuando las publicaciones hagan reinar en todo el pais el espiritu de materializar a toda costa la decision del partido, la fuerte dignidad nacional de avanzar al frente del mundo con las fuerzas y tecnologias domesticas y el coraje de superar con valentia las penas y dificultades mediante la ofensiva tenaz, la patria podra registrar el salto mas alto y mas rapido.

articles.title: Defensa de paz es voluntad invariable de RPDC, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Defensa de paz es voluntad invariable de RPDC, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido el miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que relajar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la paz duradera son la invariable posicion y voluntad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y continua:
					Eliminar el peligro de guerra y defender la paz en esa peninsula son el problema vital relacionado con el destino de la nacion y las perspectivas de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Es valiosa la paz para cualquier nacion, pero ella resulta mas importante para la nacion coreana que corre el peligro de guerra durante mas de medio siglo.
					
					Atormentan todavia a la nacion coreana los flagelos de guerra que ha sufrido en la decada de 1950.
					
					Si se desata otra vez la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, ella se extendera inevitablemente a la nuclear cuya victima mas grande sera la misma nacion coreana.
					
					La paz es la premisa de mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Es obvio que no se puede eliminar la desconfianza ni dinamizar el dialogo y la cooperacion en medio de los ejercicios militares que amenazan militarmente a la contraparte.
					
					Sin garantizar en la Peninsula Coreana el ambiente pacifico, el Norte y el Sur de Corea no pueden abrir la puerta de reunificacion mediante la reconciliacion y la unidad.
					
					La paz no se puede conseguir con los esfuerzos unilaterales de una parte.
					
					Cuando las autoridades surcoreanas respondan a los esfuerzos sinceros de la parte connacional, resultara fructifero este empeno por defender la paz.

articles.title: Liquidacion de crimenes de Japon es tarea de la epoca, insiste Minju Joson
articles.content:
Liquidacion de crimenes de Japon es tarea de la epoca, insiste Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ahora son criticadas fuertemente en la arena internacional la erronea concepcion de la historia y la bajeza moral de Japon. 
					Se discute en Europa y America la liquidacion de los crimenes del pasado de Japon que se hablaba principalmente hasta ahora en los paises asiaticos. 
					
					Estados Unidos, Gran Bretana, Francia, Alemania y otros paises del mundo se suman a las voces del pueblo coreano y los demas asiaticos que demandan ajustar las cuentas de los crimenes del pais isla. 
					
					El hecho demuestra que ese tema se presenta ahora como una prioridad de la epoca. 
					
					Senala asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua: 
					
					Sin embargo, los politicos japoneses eluden sin escrupulos la responsabilidad de pedir perdon e indemnizar. 
					
					Aunque se agranda cada dia mas el rencor sobre Japon, el pais isla habla cinicamente de la mejora de las relaciones con paises asiaticos y del establecimiento de nuevas relaciones de confianza, lo cual provoca indignacion de todo el mundo. 
					
					Si Japon desea de veras mejorar las relaciones con los paises asiaticos y abrir una nueva era de reconciliacion y cooperacion, debe reconocer primero sus crimenes y errores del pasado y pedir disculpas e indemnizar luego. 
					
					Debido a la actitud injusta e inmoral de Japon, ahora se encuentran en la peor fase las relaciones de los paises asiaticos con Japon. 
					
					Si Japon no quiere el arruinamiento moral y fisico, debe arrepentirse de sus faltas del pasado y tomar la valiente decision de corregirlas.
